<title level="1" right="Action">[Toxic Skin](/Actions.aspx?ID=732) <actions string="Reaction" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Grippli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=264" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 119 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency** once per hour

**Trigger** A creature touches you, such as by [Grappling](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) you, successfully hitting you with an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack, or using a touch-range spell against you.

</column>

---

You exude a deadly toxin. The triggering creature takes 1d4 poison damage ([basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher). At 3rd level and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage increases by 1d4.
name: Toxic Skin
